title: Cladogram orangutan gorilla chimp bonobo human 2

content.prompt: Which of the following scientific questions will best help researchers determine when the nontaster allele arose in the evolutionary history of the selected primates?

choices.label: How does the nontaster allele contribute to individual fitness?
Does the nontaster allele exist in any nonhuman primate populations?
What caused the mutations in the TAS2R38 gene?
How do the mutations in the nontaster allele affect the structure of the resulting protein?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify or pose a testable question based on an observation, data, or a model.
